attributes.action: Use LED lights for street lights, road signs and traffic lights, and look into different designs of street lights which could reduce light pollution
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
LED Lights are..

Brighter- equal brightness across the entire surface, makes them brighter overall. 

LED bulbs last for years, while halogen bulbs last for months. Costs of repairing or replacing traffic lights are high, and cause traffic jams.

LED bulbs save a lot of energy.

Sensors can be implemented to dim the street lights slightly if no motion has been detected for a certain period of time.

Less light pollution means we could see the stars at night again. When it's not cloudy that is :)

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
